questions.question: What is ArcadeHut?
questions.answer: ArcadeHut is a platform where you can host your multiplayer games with ease, whether for fun, testing, or competitive play.

questions.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use it?
questions.answer: Nope! Our interface is built to be user-friendly. Just pick a game, configure basic settings, and you're live.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes. ArcadeHut uses modern encryption and stores data in secure, isolated containers.

questions.question: Can others access my servers?
questions.answer: Only if you allow it. You control the privacy settings — from private invite-only lobbies to public servers.

questions.question: Which games are supported?
questions.answer: ArcadeHut supports popular titles like Minecraft, CS:GO, Valheim, and more — plus custom servers via Docker.

questions.question: Do you offer DDoS protection?
questions.answer: Yup! All ArcadeHut servers come with basic DDoS protection included at no extra cost.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change plans anytime. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades apply at the next billing cycle.

questions.question: Will I lose my data if I cancel?
questions.answer: No. We keep your data backed up for 30 days after cancellation in case you change your mind or want to export it.
